seo.title: Luis Arteaga | Full-Stack Web Developer (React & Next.js, Spring Boot)
seo.description: Portfolio of Luis Arteaga. Developing modern, fast, and accessible web applications that solve real problems and generate business value.

hero.subtitle: I build modern, fast, and accessible web applications that bring value to your users and business.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am a software developer focused on building high-performance solutions. My technical expertise is closely combined with a product vision: I don't just execute functional tasks, but I analyze how each development solves a specific challenge for the user or the company. I am highly collaborative and prioritize agile communication, code scalability, and consistent value delivery.

skills.frontend: React & Next.js: Dynamic and efficient interfaces, leveraging SSR/SSG to maximize SEO and user retention.
skills.typescript: TypeScript: Robust, strictly typed code, preventing critical errors and ensuring agile maintenance.
skills.backend: Spring Boot & NestJS: Robust and scalable backend architectures, managing complex business logic and distributed services.
skills.database: Databases & ORM: Expert persistence management with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Prisma to ensure data integrity.
skills.devops: DevOps & CI/CD: Automated deployments and code quality using GitHub Actions, Jenkins, SonarQube, and Fortify.
skills.testing: Testing & Quality: Software assurance through exhaustive unit testing using Jest, Mockito, and QA best practices.
skills.uiux: UI/UX & Accessibility: Implementation of people-centric designs, ensuring accessibility and great performance on mobile screens.
skills.ai: Artificial Intelligence: Creation of autonomous agents, advanced prompt engineering, and workflow automation using Large Language Models (LLMs).

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.subtitle: A summary of my roles and the impact generated through my developments.

techNova.description: Technical leadership in the architecture and deployment of the main product interface for a scalable SaaS platform.

achievements.1: Reduced Time to Interactive (TTI) by 35% using code splitting and caching techniques.
achievements.2: Developed CI/CD pipelines accelerating deployment time without service disruption.
achievements.3: Led accessibility initiatives securing WCAG 2.1 AA certifications.

techNova.technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL

dataForge.description: Development of robust analytic interfaces for big data visualization and business intelligence tools.

achievements.1: Architected a modular component system, reducing duplicate work in views by 40%.
achievements.2: Improved usability metrics by centralizing the application's style base using Tailwind CSS.
achievements.3: Increased user retention through the refactoring of frontend analytical flows.

cloudWorks.description: Development of a transactional APIs cluster and component hydration with progressive frameworks.

achievements.1: Built efficient APIs capable of securely scaling and serving enterprise resources.
achievements.2: Structured the migration to Server-Side Rendering (SSR) notably increasing organic traffic.
achievements.3: Improved observability with metrics and traces.

projects.title: Selected Projects
projects.subtitle: Real applications and portals addressing market challenges.

project1.title: Habeas Data - Severance Pay
project1.problem: Channel saturation due to manual capture of legal data processing consents.
project1.impact: Automation of the regulatory flow under legal standards, reducing operational load by 60%.

project2.title: Habeas Data - Voluntary Pensions
project2.problem: Need to parameterize specific legal consents according to the savings product.
project2.impact: Implementation of dynamic logic for multiple products using a shared technical core.

project3.title: Eligibility Validation - Severance Pay
project3.problem: Friction in the initial affiliation process and lack of user autonomy.
project3.impact: 100% digitization of the entry flow, allowing for eligibility validation in under a minute.

project4.title: Mandatory Pension Affiliation
project4.problem: Low conversion in transfer processes and failure to communicate additional benefits.
project4.technologies: React, Spring Boot, GitHub Actions, Jest
project4.impact: Conversion funnel optimization with electronic signature and corporate benefits integration.

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.description: Activities I enjoy outside of professional work.
items: Reading books about technology and philosophy

contact.title: Let's Boost Your Next Project
contact.subtitle: Looking for a developer to transform complex requirements into agile, secure, and efficient applications? Let's explore how I can bring value to your team.
